actions.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 15 (Roll no. 277).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (OH) amendment (A027) Agreed to by recorded vote: 408 - 15 (Roll no. 277).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Johnson (OH).

description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to fund Section 7101 of the SUPPORT for Patients and Communities Act at the authorized level to establish Regional Centers of Excellence in Substance Use Disorder Education.
purpose: Amendment funds the Regional Centers of Excellence in Substance Use Disorder Education, which allows the program to increase the amount of education that health professional students receive on substance use disorder, pain management, and addiction.
